summary: Want to roleplay as a lay-low/thief character, but think that a grandeur mansion just doesn't fit the bill?  Perhaps this mod will serve you well, then.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=6][i]Simple Beggar Homes of Skyrim[/i][/size][/font]

These are a simple player homes based in the major cities of Skyrim, designed to be used by a
beggar/thief/lay-low character, for roleplay purposes, or whatever you wanna use it for.
[color=#0000ff][color=#ffffff]

[b]=====================[/b][/color][/color][color=#ff0000]
[i][b]Where can I find these homes?[/b][/i][/color]
They are placed in locations I thought fitting for a beggar to call home.  
Some have cover over them for protection from the elements, but others don't.
I did have a screenshot of the location of one home, but that's not very thief-like of me.
So now you get to find the rest for yourself; check the images for hints ;)
[color=#ff0000]
[i][b]Any requirements?[/b][/i][/color]
None!  Hooray!

[color=#ff0000][b][i]Any conflicting mods?[/i][/b]
[/color]None that will blow up your game, that I am aware of, however 
any mod that adds things to the cities may introduce undesirable clipping.
I can try to build around as many city mods as I can, but
obviously I can't fix ALL clipping issues, should they arise.
[color=#ff0000]
[i][b]How to install?[/b][/i][/color]
Either install using your favorite Mod Manager, or manually
drag and drop/copy and paste the .esp into your Data folder.  Ta-Da!

[color=#ff0000][i][b]How to uninstall?[/b][/i][/color]
Deactivate the mod in your MM, or delete the .esp from your Data folder.
This mod contains a whopping ZERO scripts (gasp),
so your save will still be intact should you uninstall.
[b][color=#0000ff][color=#ffffff]=====================[/color][/color][/b]


That's basically it, really.  Nothing too fancy here.  Check it out, see if you like it, and if you do, let me know!  
I will be scouting around the different cities in the coming days looking for new spots to place homes.  
If you have an idea for somewhere to place one, let me know, you may just see it in game...

[b][i][color=#ff0000]!UPDATE, 01-25-15![/color][/i][/b]
THE BIGGUN.
I have added homes to the rest of the cities, as (hopeful) repentance for taking so
goddamn long to update this mod.  Procrastination is a blessing and a curse mixed
into one delicious sweet roll.  Expect pics in the coming days.  Also, don't be afraid to
send in [b]your[/b] pics of your character living the poor life!

Also available on the Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=382615072[/center]
author: NarpasSword0
